abstract: Community Service Society of New York, one of several organizations supported by The New York Times Neediest Cases Fund, helps Terence Marshall of Harlem buy professional work clothing and MetroCard for a summer internship.
lead_paragraph: A brush with the police shook Terence Marshall out of his idleness and prompted him to take action on his work and education goals.

headline.main: A Harlem Man’s First Steps Toward Self-Reliance
headline.print_headline: Shaken by Time in Holding Cell, a Man Pushes to Fulfill His Dreams

snippet: A brush with the police shook Terence Marshall out of his idleness and prompted him to take action on his work and education goals.
